title: cant get in to game cuz of recconect button bug
body: i started a game and got into champ select. As soon as champ select was over, the client sent me straight to reconnect screen instead of game. Tried pressing the button and the screen just flashes and doesnt reconnect or do anything just flashes no matter how many times i press it or retarted the cleint

replies.body: I'm not the only one!! And you posted only a half hour ago!!! hopefully they get to dealing with this issue, because it must have something to due with the update. #Hope
something really wierd i played a match fine on pbe secodns after how tf does that work...?
